title: Kansas DEM Overlays Collection
description: Catalog of processed overlays derived from Kansas 1 m DEMs and georeferenced historical base layers. Includes hillshade, slope/aspect derivatives, and historical USGS topographic map overlays. All overlays are documented with provenance and aligned to a web-delivery CRS (EPSG:4326) unless otherwise noted in each item.

overlays.description: Hillshade overlay generated from the 2018â€“2020 Kansas 1 m DEM.
overlays.provenance: USGS 3DEP LiDAR-derived DEM, processed via GDAL hillshade and converted to COG

overlays.description: Georeferenced 1894 USGS topographic map of Larned, Kansas, for historical context.
overlays.provenance: USGS Historical Topographic Map Collection scan georeferenced to EPSG:4326 and converted to COG (JPEG-in-COG)

data_quality.processing: All overlays are Cloud Optimized GeoTIFF (COG) with internal tiling and overviews.
data_quality.uncertainty: Historical scans may include cartographic distortions; DEM-derived products adhere to source LiDAR specifications.
data_quality.notes: Per-item CRS, resampling, and parameters are recorded in each overlay's .meta.json.
